DtScriptedTaskMetaData.myDescription: Launches (creates) a munition. The munition is not controlled or tasked. Used by munition-firing tasks, which task the munition after it is created.

myVariables.item: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="8"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>targetEntity</myVariableName> <myType>simulationobject</myType> <myLabel>Target entity</myLabel> <myToolTip>Target entity. Used to fill in fire interaction.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>All Entities</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData>DtAllEntitiesFilter</myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>
